name: 8th International Conference on Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality and Computer Graphics
content: SALENTO AVR 2021 intends to bring together the community of researchers, scientists and innovators in order to discuss key issues, approaches, ideas, open problems, innovative applications, and trends in virtual and augmented reality, 3D visualization and computer graphics in the areas of medicine, cultural heritage, arts, education, entertainment, military and industry
topics: computer graphics, animation, virtual reality & gaming
